extendedInfo.description: This app contains contains 217 formulas from all the main sections of finance. The app can be a useful tool in preparation to CFAÂ® level 1 exam. It contains the following sections: Quantitative (27 formulas)  Economics (21 formulas)  Financials (65 formulas)  Corporate finance (31 formulas)  Portfolio (17 formulas)  Equity investments (15 formulas)  Fixed income (23 formulas)  Derivatives (11 formulas)  Alternative investments (7 formulas)  Disclaimer. CFA Institute does not endorse, promote, or warrant the accuracy or quality of the products or services offered by financetoys.com. reviews.title: Not bad but annoying interface.
reviews.comment: The back button doesn\'t work properly, u have to use the annoying iOS style interface. Why make it look like an iPhone? Also would help if u could just flick to the next formula without having to go back.
reviews.author: A Google User
